bibl.title: Memphis under the Ptolemies.
bibl.note: 1. The Second City. - 2. Economic Life in Memphis. - 3. Ethnic Minorities. - 4. Ptolemies and Temples. - 5. The Undertakers. - 6. Apis and Other Cults. - 7. Between Two Worlds: The Sarapieion. - 8. Roman Memphis: An Epilogue. - Appendixes. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: Thompson Dorothy J., Memphis under the Ptolemies.
Princeton, University Press, 1988, 8°, xix-342 pp., 10 figg., 5 tabl. et 8 pll.

1. The Second City. - 2. Economic Life in Memphis. - 3. Ethnic Minorities. - 4. Ptolemies and Temples. - 5. The Undertakers. - 6. Apis and Other Cults. - 7. Between Two Worlds: The Sarapieion. - 8. Roman Memphis: An Epilogue. - Appendixes. Bibliography. Index.

C.R. par Raymond Bogaert, Gnomon 62 (1990) pp. 609-612. - Lucia Criscuolo, Aegyptus 70 (1990) pp. 300-301. - J.G. Manning, CP 85 (1990) pp. 317-320. - John F.
